engine

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • engine.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ball, GoalLine, Paddle

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.geom.Point2D position
      The position of the object in the game world.
      private java.awt.Shape shape
      The shape of the object.
      private Sprite sprite
      The sprite used for rendering the object on the screen.
      protected Vector2D vector
      The direction and speed of the object.

      java.awt.Shape getShape()
      Returns the shape if this object.
      Sprite getSprite()
      Returns this objects sprite.
      java.awt.geom.AffineTransform getTranslateTransform()
      Returns a transform object to translate a coordinate space to this objects position.
      protected void onRender(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Renders the objects sprite to the given graphics context.
      protected void onUpdate(Engine e, long tick)
      This method is called by the game engine every 1/FRAME_RATE seconds.
      void register(Engine e)
      Registers the object with the game engine.
      private void renderTo(java.awt.Graphics2D g)
      Translates the coordinate space to this objects position and calls onRender.
      protected void setShape(java.awt.Shape shape)
      Sets the shape of this object.
      protected void setSprite(Sprite sprite)
      Sets this objects sprite.

      • onUpdate

        protected void onUpdate(Engine e,
            long tick)
        This method is called by the game engine every 1/FRAME_RATE seconds.
        Parameters:
        e - The game engine.
        tick - The number of seconds since the last update.
